text: Polygaloides is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Polygalaceae. ==Species== , Plants of the World Online accepted the following species: *Polygaloides balansae (Coss.) O.Schwarz *Polygaloides chamaebuxus (L.) O.Schwarz *Polygaloides munbyana (Boiss. & Reut.) O.Schwarz *Polygaloides paucifolia (Willd.) J.R.Abbott *Polygaloides vayredae (Costa) O.Schwarz *Polygaloides webbiana (Coss.) O.Schwarz ==References== Category:Polygalaceae Category:Fabales genera
title: Polygaloides
